required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence of Orfadin Suspension Compared to Orfadin Capsules, and the Effect of Food on the Bioavailability of the Suspension
clinical_study.official_title: A Study to Evaluate the Bioequivalence of Orfadin Suspension 4 mg/mL Compared to Orfadin Capsules 10 mg, and the Effect of Food on the Bioavailability of the Suspension. An Open-label, Randomized, Cross-over, Single-dose Study in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The study is primarily being performed in order to demonstrate bioequivalence between the Orfadin (nitisinone) suspension and the marketed capsule formulation. The study will also contain a comparison of the bioavailability of the suspension given with food and on an empty stomach.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is an open, randomized 3-way crossover study in 12 healthy volunteers. Subjects will receive single oral 30-mg doses of nitisinone as a suspension (fasting and with food) and as hard gelatin capsules (fasting only). There will be a 2-week washout period between the doses.
There will be a screening visit within 3 weeks prior to the first dose. During each treatment period, subjects will be admitted to the clinic from the afternoon on the day before drug administration (i.e., on Day -1) and remain at the clinic until the 48-hour post-dose blood sample has been collected in the morning of Day 3. They will then return for ambulatory visit in the morning of Day 4 (72-hour sample). A follow-up visit will take place 7-14 days after the last dose.

primary_outcome.measure: The Area Under the Serum Concentration Curve (AUC) During 72 Hours After Dose (AUC72h) During Fasting Conditions.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and at 15, 30, 45 minutes and 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose.

primary_outcome.measure: The Maximum Serum Concentration (Cmax) During Fasting Conditions.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and at 15, 30, 45 minutes and 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose.

arm_group.description: Orfadin suspension 4 mg/mL, single dose 30 mg (7,5 mL)
Orfadin suspension 4mg/mL, single dose 30 mg (7,5 mL)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male volunteers
- Age: 18-55 years, inclusive
- BMI: 18,5-30,0 kg/m2, inclusive
Exclusion Criteria:
- heavy smokers
- Consumption of more than 4 cups of coffee per day.
- History of drug and/or alcohol abuse.
- Positive drug screen or alcohol breath test.
- Positive screens for hepatitis B surface antigen, hepatitis C antibodies and human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) 1-2 antibodies.
- Enrollment in another concurrent clinical study
- Intake of an investigational medicinal product within three months prior to inclusion in this study.
- Donation of more than 50 mL of blood within 60 days prior to drug administration
- Donation of more than 1,5 liters of blood in the 10 months prior to first drug administration.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: First subject screened: 29 August 2012 Last subject last visit: 25 October 2012.

group.title: All Treatment Groups
group.description: All participants received all study treatments in a randomized fashion. Subjects were allocated to one of the following treatment sequences (2 subjects to each sequence): A B C; B C A; C A B; C B A; A C B; B A C where A=Orfadin capsules, single dose, 30 mg; B=Orfadin suspension, single dose 30 mg, fasting; C=Orfadin suspension, single dose 30 mg, fed

group.title: Overall Study
group.description: All treatment arms

outcome.title: The Area Under the Serum Concentration Curve (AUC) During 72 Hours After Dose (AUC72h) During Fasting Conditions.
outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and at 15, 30, 45 minutes and 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose.
outcome.population: Full analysis set was used; subjects with available PK data for at least one of the treatments.

group.title: Orfadin Capsules, Fasting
group.description: Orfadin capsules, single dose, 30 mg

group.title: Orfadin Suspension, Fasting
group.description: Orfadin suspension 4 mg/mL, single dose, 30 mg (7,5 mL)

measure.title: The Area Under the Serum Concentration Curve (AUC) During 72 Hours After Dose (AUC72h) During Fasting Conditions.
measure.population: Full analysis set was used; subjects with available PK data for at least one of the treatments.

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Bioequivalence was established if the 90% confidence interval of the ratio was completely within the acceptance range (0.80-1.25)

outcome.title: The Maximum Serum Concentration (Cmax) During Fasting Conditions.
outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose and at 15, 30, 45 minutes and 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours postdose.
outcome.population: Full analysis set was used; subjects with available PK data for at least one of the treatments.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
